titles.title: Wild Horse Oversight Act
To amend the Wild Free-Roaming Horses and Burros Act to provide for State and tribal management and protection of wild free-roaming horses and burros, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources
